Show HN: Image Manipulation via Triangulation
text: This project is a first principles approach to image representation and manipulation. I got interested in alternatives to the pixel grid, intrigued by the in some respect even simpler division of 2D space by the simplicial complex, i.e., the triangulation. The main concrete contribution here is a triangulation algorithm which is specifically retains contour.

title: Patriot Response Group – Full stack developer – Full time
text:
Happy Monday.

My friend in startup space is looking for a Full stack Developer. If you know anyone skilled in Web, Mobile application, and API development, has SQL experience, is willing to learn new frameworks, has excellent debugging skills, and is looking for a new challenge, we would love to hear from you. Send your references and resume to DJ Ursal @ https://www.linkedin.com/in/djursal/. Feel free to forward this post to anyone who is interested and let me know if you need an introduction.

Required: • Bachelor’s degree in C. S., Mathematics, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent experience. • Minimum combined five years of programming experience in web and mobile-based applications. • Experience building and maintaining APIs • Experience with SQL, SQL Server, or PostgreSQL is a plus.

The person can be virtual but has to be here, LOCATED in the United States, and willing to travel 10% throughout the year.

About the Company Patriot Response Group is looking for a full-time software developers passionate about creating a cutting-edge platform. Patriot Response Group is a full-service Emergency Management firm offering more than 60 years of combined leadership experience in disaster response, recovery, and construction services. Operating in the U.S. and its territories, we focus on regions with limited resources and communities devastated by hurricanes, tornados, and severe flooding.

Our values: Passion, Integrity, and Loyalty.

This is an excellent opportunity to work on a friendly team of dedicated professionals in a culture that values teamwork, continuous learning, and service.

Show HN: Steddy – Robinhood for Exercise
text:
After talking to a lot of people about their exercise habits, we realized that one of the most popular apps for tracking workouts is actually the Notes app.

Because most people’s interests and hobbies change, it’s very hard for a single type of exercise app (running, lifting, CrossFit, etc.) to remain useful to people over the long run.

So we built Steddy: an exercise app with no videos, fitness models, or made up weight loss projections.

Instead, planning and check-in is as simple as a well-designed todo app. Our goal is to make it as easy as possible to “deposit” your exercise each time you get active and watch your fitness compound over time.

Would love any suggestions, feedback, or advice; and happy to answer any questions!

title: Ask HN: Are there any blockchain projects NOT around cryptocurrencies?
text:
It seems that every blockchain related project I see in the wild is always revolving around finance. It's either a coin, exchange, lending platform or DAO for some financial transaction.

This got me wondering. Are there any blockchain projects or products in the wild that use blockchain but are not finance driven.
